section.title: Demonstration 1 Main Page

content.text: This demonstration covers a simple construction purchase order (PN) partial receiving report (RW) and linking it to the asset record. It provides a step-by-step guide of linking the asset record and changing the asset accounting line for partial receipt amount. It demonstrates the following key concepts: How to change accounting line amounts on a receiving report with fixed asset records. How to change asset accounting line amounts to ensure they total full amount of receiving report.

content.text: This is the Header page for the Receipt (RW).
Select the Accounting Line link so we can enter the amount we will receive.
The Accounting Line page appears. We will change the Amount to $50,000.
Select the Header Accounting Lines link
Select the Header Accounting Line and click the Header Accounting Line link.
On the Header Accounting Line, scroll down and enter the amount we will receive. It must be the same amount as on the Asset Accounting Line, $50,000.
If there are no errors, click the Submit button
